column1: S0210.CARD.  1. CARD ONE
S0210.DECK.  210. SURVEY NUMBER
S0210.BALLOT.  X. BALLOT NUMBER GENERATED BY ROPER CENTER.

S0210.Q1. WHAT IS YOUR ARMY RANK OR GRAD?  1. PRIVATE 2. PRIVATE FIRST CLASS 3. TECHNICIAN 5TH GRADE OR CORPORAL 4. TECHNICIAN 4TH GRADE OR SERGEANT 5. TECHNICIAN 3RD GRADE OR STAFF SERGEANT 6. TECHNICAL SERGEANT 7. MASTER SERGEANT OR FIRST SERGEANT 0. NO ANSWER
S0210.Q2. HOW OLD WERE YOU ON YOUR LAST BIRTHDA?  01. 19 YEARS 02. 20 03. 21 04. 22 05. 23 06. 24 07. 25 08. 26-29 YEARS 09. 30-34 YEARS 10. 35 YEARS AND OVER 00. NO ANSWER

S0210.Q3. HOW FAR DID YOU GO IN SCHOO?  1. LESS THAN 6TH GRADE 2. FINISHED 6TH GRADE 3. FINISHED 7TH GRADE 4. FINISHED 8TH GRADE 5. SOME HIGH SCHOOL BUT DID NOT FINISH 6. GRADUATED FROM HIGH SCHOOL 7. SOME COLLEGE BUT DID NOT FINISH 8. GRADUATED FROM COLLEGE 0. NO ANSWER

S0210.Q4. IN WHAT STATE OF THE UNITED STATES DID YOU SPEND MOST OF THE LAST FIVE YEARS OF YOUR CIVILIAN LIFE BEFORE YOU CAME INTO THE ARM? E. SECTION:  1. NEW ENGLAND 2. MIDDLE ATLANTIC 3. EAST NORTH CENTRAL 4. WEST NORTH CENTRAL 5. SOUTH ATLANTIC 6. EAST SOUTH CENTRAL 7. WEST SOUTH CENTRAL 8. MOUNTAIN 9. PACIFIC 0. NO ANSWER

S0210.Q5. WHERE WERE YOU LIVING MOST OF THE LAST FIVE YEARS OF YOUR CIVILIAN LIFE BEFORE YOU CAME INTO THE ARM?  1. ON A FARM OR IN THE COUNTRY 2. IN A SMALL TOWN (FEWER THAN 2,500 PEOPLE) 3. IN A TOWN (WITH BETWEEN 2,500 AND 25,000 PEOPLE) 4. IN A CITY (BETWEEN 25,000 AND 100,000 PEOPLE) 5. IN A LARGE CITY (MORE THAN 100,000 PEOPLE) 0. NO ANSWER
S0210.Q6. ARE YOU:  1. SINGLE 2. MARRIED 3. DIVORCED OR SEPARATED 4. WIDOWED 0. NO ANSWER
S0210.Q7. WERE YOU MARRIED BEFORE OR AFTER ENTERING THE ARM?  1. MARRIED BEFORE ENTERING THE ARMY 2. MARRIED AFTER ENTERING THE ARMY 3. I'M NOT MARRIED 0. NO ANSWER
S0210.Q8. HOW MANY CHILDREN DO YOU HAV?  1. HAVE ONE CHILD 2. HAVE TWO CHILDREN 3. HAVE THREE OR MORE CHILDREN 4. HAVE NO CHILDREN 5. I'M NOT MARRIED 0. NO ANSWER
S0210.Q9. HOW DID YOU COME INTO THE ARM?  1. I WAS DRAFTED 2. I VOLUNTEERED 3. I WAS IN THE NATIONAL GUARD 4. ENLISTED RESERVE CORPS (ERC), RESERVE OFFICER TRAINING CORPS (ROTC), ETC. 0. NO ANSWER

S0210.Q10. HOW LONG HAVE YOU BEEN IN THE ARM?  1. 6 MONTHS OR LESS 2. OVER 6 MONTHS UP TO 9 MONTHS 3. OVER 9 MONTHS UP TO 1 YEAR 4. OVER 1 YEAR UP TO 2 YEARS 5. OVER 2 YEARS UP TO 3 YEARS 6. OVER 3 YEARS UP TO 4 YEARS 7. OVER 4 YEARS 0. NO ANSWER

S0210.Q11. HOW LONG HAVE YOU BEEN IN CHINA-BURMA-INDI?  1. 3 MONTHS OR LESS 2. OVER 3 MONTHS UP TO 6 MONTHS 3. OVER 6 MONTHS UP TO 9 MONTHS 4. OVER 9 MONTHS UP TO 1 YEAR 5. OVER 1 YEAR UP TO 18 MONTHS 6. OVER 18 MONTHS UP TO 2 YEARS 7. OVER 2 YEARS UP TO 30 MONTHS 8. OVER 30 MONTHS UP TO 3 YEARS 9. OVER 3 YEARS 0. NO ANSWER

S0210.Q12. HOW LONG HAVE YOU BEEN STATIONED AT THIS PARTICULAR PLAC?  1. 3 MONTHS OR LESS 2. OVER 3 MONTHS UP TO 6 MONTHS 3. OVER 6 MONTHS UP TO 9 MONTHS 4. OVER 9 MONTHS UP TO 1 YEAR 5. OVER 1 YEAR UP TO 18 MONTHS 6. OVER 18 MONTHS UP TO 2 YEARS 7. OVER 2 YEARS 0. NO ANSWER

S0210.Q13. WHAT BRANCH OF THE ARMY ARE YOU IN NO?  01. ENGINEERS 02. FIELD ARTILLERY 03. QUARTERMASTER CORPS 04. INFANTRY 05. MEDICAL DEPARTMENT 06. ARMORED FORCE 07. SIGNAL CORPS 08. FINANCE DEPARTMENT 09. COST ARTILLERY AND ANTI-AIRCRAFT 10. AIR CORPS 11. TRANSPORTATION CORPS 12. ORDNANCE DEPARTMENT 13. CHEMICAL WARFARE SERVICE 14. MILITARY POLICE 15. D.E.M.L. 16. OTHER

S0210.Q14. HOW SATISFIED ARE YOU ABOUT BEING IN YOUR PRESENT ARMY JOB INSTEAD OF SOME OTHER ARMY JO?  1. VERY SATISFIED 2. SATISFIED 3. VERY DISSATISFIED 4. DISSATISFIED 5. IT DOES NOT MAKE ANY DIFFERENCE TO ME 0. NO ANSWER
S0210.Q15. DO YOU FEEL PROUD OF YOUR COMPANY (BATTERY, SQUADRON, TROOP)*  1. YES, VERY PROUD 2. YES, FAIRLY PROUD 3. NO, NOT PROUD 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S0210.Q16. IF IT WERE UP TO YOU, WHAT KIND OF AN OUTFIT WOULD YOU RATHER BE I?  1. IN A COMBAT OUTFIT OVERSEAS 2. IN A NON-COMBAT OUTFIT OVERSEAS 3. IN AN OUTFIT STATIONED IN THE UNITED STATES 0. NO ANSWER
S0210.Q17. HOW IMPORTANT DO YOU CONSIDER YOUR OWN ARMY JOB IN THE TOTAL WAR EFFOR?  1. VERY IMPORTANT 2. FAIRLY IMPORTANT 3. NOT SO IMPORTANT 4. NOT IMPORTANT AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER

S0210.Q18. HOW MANY OF YOUR COMPANY OFFICERS ARE THE KIND WHO ARE WILLING TO GO THROUGH ANYTHING THEY ASK THEIR MEN TO GO THROUG?  1. ALL OF THEM ARE 2. MOST OF THEM ARE 3. ABOUT HALF OF THEM ARE 4. FEW OF THEM ARE 5. NONE OF THEM ARE 0. NO ANSWER

S0210.Q19. DO YOU FEEL THAT YOUR OFFICERS HAVE AN INTEREST IN YOUR PERSONAL PROBLEMS AND WELFAR?  1. THEY HAVE A GREAT DEAL OF INTEREST 2. THEY HAVE A FAIR AMOUNT OF INTEREST 3. THEY DON'T HAVE MUCH INTEREST 4. THEY HAVE NO INTEREST AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER
S0210.Q20. IF IT WERE UP TO YOU TO CHOOSE, DO YOU THINK YOU COULD DO MORE FOR YOUR COUNTRY AS A SOLDIER OR AS A WORKER IN A WAR JO?  1. AS A SOLDIER 2. AS A WAR WORKER 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S0210.Q21. ARE THE MESS FACILITIES AND FOOD IN YOUR OUTFIT AS GOOD AS THEY COULD BE UNDER PRESENT CIRCUMSTANCE?  1. YES, AS GOOD AS THEY COULD BE 2. NO, NOT AS GOOD AS THEY COULD BE 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
S0210.Q22. IN GENERAL, DO YOU FEEL YOU YOURSELF HAVE GOTTEN A SQUARE DEAL FROM THE ARM?  1. YES, I HAVE 2. NO, I HAVEN'T 3. IN SOME WAYS, YES, IN SOME WAYS, NO 4. I HAVE NO OPINION 0. NO ANSWER

S0210.Q23. HOW WOULD YOU RATE YOUR GENERAL PHYSICAL CONDITION DURING THE PAST MONT?  1. MY PHYSICAL CONDITION HAS BEEN VERY GOOD 2. MY PHYSICAL CONDITION HAS BEEN PRETTY GOOD 3. MY PHYSICAL CONDITION HAS NOT BEEN SO GOOD 4. MY PHYSICAL CONDITION HAS BEEN VERY POOR 0. NO ANSWER

S0210.Q24. IN GENERAL, HOW WELL DO YOU THINK THE AMERICAN ARMY IS RU?  1. IT IS RUN VERY WELL 2. IT IS RUN FAIRLY WELL 3. IT IS NOT RUN SO WELL 4. IT IS RUN VERY POORLY 5. I HAVE NO OPINION 0. NO ANSWER

S0210.Q25. IN GENERAL, HOW WELL DO YOU THINK THE INDIA-BURMA THEATER IS RU?  1. IT IS RUN VERY WELL 2. IT IS RUN FAIRLY WELL 3. IT IS NOT RUN SO WELL 4. IT IS RUN VERY POORLY 5. I HAVE NO OPINION 0. NO ANSWER

S0210.Q27. HOW MUCH LONGER FROM NOW DO YOU THINK IT WILL BE BEFORE YOU GO BACK TO THE UNITED STATES TO STA?  1. 6 MONTHS OR LESS 2. OVER 6 MONTHS UP TO 9 MONTHS 3. OVER 9 MONTHS UP TO 1 YEAR 4. OVER 1 YEAR UP TO 18 MONTHS 5. OVER 18 MONTHS UP TO 2 YEARS 6. OVER 2 YEARS 0. NO ANSWER

S0210.Q28. AFTER THE WAR IN EUROPE IS OVER, WHICH ONE OF THE FOLLOWING THINGS DO YOU THINK WILL PROBABLY HAPPEN TO MOST OF THE AMERICAN COMBAT SOLDIERS NOW STATIONED IN EUROP?  1. MOST OF THEM WILL PROBABLY BE IN THE ARMY OF OCCUPATION IN EUROPE 2. MOST OF THEM WILL PROBABLY BE DISCHARGED FROM THE ARMY 3. MOST OF THEM WILL PROBABLY GET PERMANENT ARMY JOBS IN THE UNITED STATES 4. MOST OF THEM WILL PROBABLY GET A FURLOUGH IN THE UNITED STATES AND THEN BE SENT OVERSEAS TO FIGHT THE JAPANESE 5. MOST OF THEM WILL PROBABLY BE SENT DIRECTLY FROM EUROPE TO FIGHT THE JAPANESE 6. I HAVE NO OPINION 0. NO ANSWER

S0210.Q29. HOW ABOUT THE SUPPLY TROOPS AND SERVICE TROOPS IN EUROP? AFTER THE WAR IN EUROPE IS OVER, WHICH ONE OF THE FOLLOWING THINGS DO YOU THINK WILL PROBABLY HAPPEN TO MOST OF THE SUPPLY TROOPS AND SERVICE TROOPS NOW STATIONED IN EUROP?  1. MOST OF THEM WILL PROBABLY BE IN THE ARMY OF OCCUPATION IN EUROPE 2. MOST OF THEM WILL PROBABLY BE DISCHARGED FROM THE ARMY 3. MOST OF THEM WILL PROBABLY GET PERMANENT ARMY JOBS IN THE UNITED STATES 4. MOST OF THEM WILL PROBABLY GET A FURLOUGH IN THE UNITED STATES AND THEN BE SENT OVERSEAS TO SERVE AGAINST THE JAPANESE 5. MOST OF THEM WILL PROBABLY BE SENT DIRECTLY FROM EUROPE TO SERVE AGAINST THE JAPANESE 6. I HAVE NO OPINION 0. NO ANSWER

S0210.Q30. AFTER THE WAR IN EUROPE IS OVER WHICH ONE OF THE FOLLOWING THINGS DO YOU THINK WILL PROBABLY HAPPEN TO MOST OF THE COMBAT SOLDIERS WHO HAVE BEEN IN TRAINING IN THE UNITED STATE?  1. MOST OF THEM WILL PROBABLY BE IN THE ARMY OF OCCUPATION IN EUROPE 2. MOST OF THEM WILL PROBABLY BE DISCHARGED FROM THE ARMY 3. MOST OF THEM WILL PROBABLY BE KEPT IN THE UNITED STATES 4. MOST OF THEM WILL PROBABLY BE SENT OVERSEAS TO FIGHT THE JAPANESE 5. I HAVE NO OPINION 0. NO ANSWER

S0210.Q31. HOW ABOUT THE SUPPLY AND SERVICE TROOPS IN THE UNITED STATE? AFTER THE WAR IN EUROPE IS OVER, WHICH ONE OF THE FOLLOWING THINGS DO YOU THINK WILL PROBABLY HAPPEN TO MOST OF THE SERVICE TROOPS AND SUPPLY TROOPS THAT HAVE BEEN KEPT IN THE UNITED STATE?  1. MOST OF THEM WILL PROBABLY BE IN THE ARMY OF OCCUPATION IN EUROPE 2. MOST OF THEM WILL PROBABLY BE DISCHARGED FROM THE ARMY 3. MOST OF THEM WILL PROBABLY BE KEPT IN THE UNITED STATES 4. MOST OF THEM WILL PROBABLY BE SENT OVERSEAS TO SERVE AGAINST THE JAPANESE 5. I HAVE NO OPINION 0. NO ANSWER

S0210.Q32. AFTER THE WAR IN EUROPE IS OVER, WHICH ONE OF THE FOLLOWING THINGS DO YOU THINK WILL PROBABLY HAPPEN TO YOUR OWN OUTFI?  1. SOME OF THE MEN WILL GO HOME AND SOME WILL STAY IN THIS THEATER 2. SOME OF THE MEN WILL BE TRANSFERRED TO ANOTHER THEATER OF OPERATIONS AND SOME WILL STAY IN THIS THEATER 3. THE WHOLE OUTFIT WILL STAY IN THIS THEATER 4. THE WHOLE OUTFIT WILL BE TRANSFERRED TO THE UNITED STATES 5. THE WHOLE OUTFIT WILL BE TRANSFERRED TO CHINA 6. THE WHOLE OUTFIT WILL BE TRANSFERRED TO THE PACIFIC 7. I HAVE NO OPINION 0. NO ANSWER E. QUESTION 33 WAS NOT CODED PROPERLY. MANY MEN DESCRIBED CHANGES THEY THOUGHT WOULD OCCUR, BUT DID NOT CHECK "YES, THERE WILL BE CHANGES". THESE ARE CODED AS NO ANSWER.

S0210.Q33. AFTER THE WAR IN EUROPE IS OVER, DO YOU THINK THERE WILL BE ANY CHANGE IN THE WAY ROTATION WORKS FOR THE MEN IN THE INDIA-BURMA THEATE?  1. YES, THERE WILL PROBABLY BE SOME CHANGES (SPECIFY) 2. NO, THERE WILL PROBABLY NOT BE ANY CHANGES 0. NO ANSWER

S0210.Q34. AFTER THE WAR IN EUROPE IS OVER, WHICH ONE OF THE FOLLOWING THINGS DO YOU THINK MOST OF THE MEN IN YOUR OUTFIT WILL PROBABLY D?  1. MOST OF THEM WILL PROBABLY WORK HARDER THAN THEY DO NOW 2. MOST OF THEM WILL PROBABLY WORK JUST ABOUT AS HARD AS THEY DO NOW 3. MOST OF THEM WILL PROBABLY NOT WORK AS HARD AS THEY DO NOW 4. I HAVE NO OPINION 0. NO ANSWER

S0210.Q35. HOW ABOUT YOU YOURSEL? AFTER THE WAR IN EUROPE IS OVER, WHICH ONE OF THE FOLLOWING THINGS DO YOU THINK YOU WILL PROBABLY D?  1. I WILL PROBABLY WORK HARDER THAN I DO NOW 2. I WILL PROBABLY WORK JUST ABOUT AS HARD AS I DO NOW 3. I WILL PROBABLY NOT WORK AS HARD AS I DO NOW 4. I HAVE NO OPINION 0. NO ANSWER

S0210.Q36. AFTER THE WAR IN EUROPE IS OVER, WHICH ONE OF THE FOLLOWING THINGS DO YOU THINK RUSSIA WILL PROBABLY D?  1. RUSSIA WILL PROBABLY DECLARE WAR ON JAPAN AND WILL SEND MEN TO FIGHT THE JAPANESE 2. RUSSIA WILL PROBABLY NOT DECLARE WAR ON JAPAN, BUT RUSSIA WILL COOPERATE WITH THE ALLIES AGAINST THE JAPANESE 3. RUSSIA WILL PROBABLY BE STRICTLY NEUTRAL AND WILL NOT COOPERATE WITH THE ALLIES 4. RUSSIA WILL LINE UP ON THE JAPANESE SIDE TO FIGHT THE ALLIES 5. I HAVE NO OPINION 0. NO ANSWER

S0210.Q37. CONSIDERING WHAT THE CHINESE ARE DOING IN THE TOTAL WAR EFFORT, DO YOU THINK THAT WE ARE NOW GIVING THEM TOO MUCH HELP OR TOO LITTLE HEL?  1. WE ARE GIVING CHINA TOO MUCH HELP 2. WE ARE GIVING CHINA ABOUT THE RIGHT AMOUNT OF HELP 3. WE ARE NOT GIVING CHINA ENOUGH HELP 4. I HAVE NO OPINION 0. NO ANSWER

S0210.Q38. AFTER THE WAR IN EUROPE IS OVER, WHAT DO YOU THINK THE BRITISH WILL PROBABLY DO IN THE WAR AGAINST JAPA?  1. THE BRITISH WILL PROBABLY DO MORE THAN THEIR SHARE 2. THE BRITISH WILL PROBABLY DO THEIR SHARE 3. THE BRITISH WILL PROBABLY DO LESS THAN THEIR SHARE 4. I HAVE NO OPINION 0. NO ANSWER

S0210.Q39. HOW IMPORTANT DO YOU CONSIDER THE INDIA-BURMA THEATER, RIGHT NOW, IN THE TOTAL WAR EFFOR?  1. VERY IMPORTANT 2. FAIRLY IMPORTANT 3. NOT SO IMPORTANT 4. NOT IMPORTANT AT ALL 5. I HAVE NO OPINION 0. NO ANSWER

S0210.Q40. AFTER THE WAR IN EUROPE IS OVER, DO YOU THINK THE INDIA-BURMA THEATER WILL BE MORE IMPORTANT THAN IT IS NOW OR LESS IMPORTANT THAN IT IS NOW IN THE TOTAL WAR EFFOR?  1. MORE IMPORTANT THAN IT IS NOW 2. JUST ABOUT THE SAME AS NOW 3. LESS IMPORTANT THAN IT IS NOW 4. I HAVE NO OPINION 0. NO ANSWER

S0210.Q41. IF THE JAPANESE WERE TO OFFER TO STOP FIGHTING NOW AND TO GIVE UP ALL THE LAND THEY HAVE TAKEN OVER, DO YOU THINK WE SHOULD TALK PEACE TERMS WITH THEM OR NO?  1. WE SHOULD TALK PEACE NOW 2. WE SHOULD KEEP ON FIGHTING UNTIL THEY SURRENDER UNCONDITIONALLY 3. I HAVE NO OPINION 0. NO ANSWER

S0210.Q42. AFTER THE WAR IN EUROPE IS OVER THE ARMY HAS ANNOUNCED A PLAN FOR DISCHARGING MEN. HOW WELL DO YOU THINK THE ARMY WILL HANDLE THE PROBLEM OF DISCHARGING MEN WHEN THE TIME COME?  1. VERY WELL 2. FAIRLY WELL 3. NOT SO WELL 4. POORLY 0. NO ANSWER

S0210.Q44. IN GENERAL, DO YOU THINK CIVILIANS (MEN AND WOMEN NOT IN UNIFORM) BACK HOME ARE TRYING TO DO EVERYTHING THEY POSSIBLY CAN TO HELP THE WAR EFFOR?  1. ALMOST ALL OF THEM ARE 2. A GOOD MANY OF THEM ARE 3. SOME, BUT NOT MANY ARE 4. HARDLY ANY OF THEM ARE 5. I HAVE NO OPINION 0. NO ANSWER

S0210.Q45. AFTER THE WAR IN EUROPE IS OVER, WHAT DO YOU THINK WE SHOULD DO ABOUT HITLER, GOERING, GOEBBELS, HIMMLER AND OTHER NAZI LEADERS WHO HAVE BEEN CALLED "WAR CRIMINALS"*  1. THEY SHOULD BE TRIED BY A COURT AND THE COURT SHOULD DECIDE WHAT TO DO WITH THEM 2. THEY ARE OBVIOUSLY GUILTY AND SHOULD IMMEDIATELY BE KILLED WITHOUT STANDING TRIAL 3. IT DOESN'T MAKE MUCH DIFFERENCE - THE IMPORTANT THING IS TO MAKE PEACE AND SEND THE AMERICAN SOLDIERS BACK HOME 4. I HAVE NO OPINION 0. NO ANSWER

S0210.Q46. AFTER THE WAR WITH JAPAN IS OVER, WHAT DO YOU THINK WE SHOULD DO ABOUT HIROHITO, TOJO, KOISO AND OTHER JAPANESE LEADERS WHO HAVE BEEN CALLED "WAR CRIMINALS"*  1. THEY SHOULD BE TRIED BY A COURT AND THE COURT SHOULD DECIDE WHAT TO DO WITH THEM 2. THEY ARE OBVIOUSLY GUILTY AND SHOULD IMMEDIATELY BE KILLED WITHOUT STANDING TRIAL 3. IT DOESN'T MAKE MUCH DIFFERENCE - THE IMPORTANT THING IS TO MAKE PEACE AND SEND THE AMERICAN SOLDIERS BACK HOME 4. I HAVE NO OPINION 0. NO ANSWER P. "NEWSMAP" (CHINA-BURMA-INDIA EDITION) IS A LARGE POSTER PUT OUT IN THIS THEATER ONCE A WEEK, AND POSTED IN ARMY STATIONS. IT HAS MAPS, PICTURES AND NEWS OF THE FIGHTING FRONTS.
S0210.Q47. HAVE YOU EVER SEEN THE NEWSMAP (CHINA-BURMA-INDIA EDITION) AT THIS STATIO?  1. YES, I HAVE SEEN IT AT THIS STATION 2. NO, I HAVE NEVER SEEN IT AT THIS STATION 3. DON'T KNOW 0. NO ANSWER

S0210.Q48. DO YOU LOOK AT THE NEW NEWSMAP (CHINA-BURMA-INDIA EDITION) EVERY TIME ONE COMES I?  1. I LOOK AT THE NEW ONE EVERY TIME IT COMES IN 2. I LOOK AT SOME OF THEM BUT DO NOT SEE EVERY NEW ONE 3. I VERY SELDOM LOOK AT THE NEWSMAP 4. I HAVE NEVER SEEN A NEWSMAP AT THIS STATION 0. NO ANSWER E. CODED RESPONSES TO QUESTIONS 49, 50, 51 SHOULD BE IGNORED SINCE THERE WAS OBVIOUSLY SOME CONFUSION IN THE MINDS OF THE RESPONDENTS AS TO THE SUBJECT UNDER CONSIDERATION. OBJECTIVE OBSERVATION AND INVESTIGATION SHOWED THAT IN PRACTICALLY NONE OF THE OUTFITS SAMPLED WERE ORIENTATION DISCUSSION MEETINGS BEING HELD.

S0210.Q49. ABOUT HOW OFTEN DO YOU GO TO ORIENTATION DISCUSSION MEETINGS - THAT IS, MEETINGS LED BY EITHER AN OFFICER OR AN ENLISTED MAN, TO DISCUSS THE WAR AND WHAT IT MEAN?  1. LESS OFTEN THAN ONCE A WEEK 2. ONCE A WEEK 3. MORE THAN ONCE A WEEK 4. NOT AT ALL 5. WE DON'T HAVE ORIENTATION MEETINGS IN OUR OUTFIT 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTION 50 NOT CODED.

S0210.Q51. IS THE NEWSMAP (CBI EDITION) USED BY THE OFFICER OR ENLISTED MAN WHO LEADS THE ORIENTATION DISCUSSION MEETING?  1. YES, THE CBI NEWSMAP IS USUALLY USED IN ORIENTATION MEETINGS 2. YES, THE CBI NEWSMAP IS USED ONCE IN A WHILE IN ORIENTATION MEETINGS 3. NO, CBI NEWSMAP IS NEVER USED IN ORIENTATION MEETINGS 4. WE DON'T HAVE ORIENTATION MEETINGS IN OUR OUTFIT 5. DON'T KNOW 0. NO ANSWER

S0210.Q52. WHAT IS THE ONE MAIN SOURCE WHICH YOU DEPEND ON MOST TO GET NEWS ABOUT THE WAR EVERY DA?  1. DAILY NEWSPAPERS 2. DAILY NEWS BULLETIN PUT OUT BY THIS STATION 3. U.S. ARMY RADIO STATION 4. SHORT WAVE RADIO FROM THE UNITED STATES 5. SHORT WAVE RADIO FROM JAPANESE STATIONS 6. SHORT WAVE RADIO FROM BBC (OR ALL-INDIA) 7. YANK DAILY BULLETIN 8. I DON'T GET NEWS ABOUT THE WAR EVERY DAY 0. NO ANSWER

S0210.Q53. IN THE LAST MONTH, WHERE HAVE YOU BEEN GETTING YOUR NEWS ABOUT THE WA?  159 1. SHORT WAVE RADIO FROM B.B.C. (OR ALL-INDIA) 728 2. NOT CHOSEN
